sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name,

Your item is approved and is assigned to a driver Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name.

Best regards,

Sensational 7

Dear Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name,

Your item is not approved for delivery.

Kindly visit our Knowledge center for more guidelines on items approved for delivery.

Best regards,

Sensational 7

Dear Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name,

Your item has been delivered safely and we look forward to serving you always.

Best regards,

Sensational 7

Dear Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name,

Kindly meet up our client for pickup of item at Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Pickup Address and deliver it at Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Delivery Address.

Best regards,

Sensational 7

Dear Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name,

Your item request was received and sent for approval. Kindly be patient as a driver will be assigned to you as soon as approval is made

Best regards,

Sensational 7

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name,

Kindly pick up item at Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Pickup Addressand deliver to Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Delivery Address on Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛Due date.

Best regards,

Sensational 7

Dear Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name,

Your requested delivery item is approved. A driver named 2 - Update Record➛...➛First name is assigned to pickup your item.

Best regards,

Sensational 7

Dear Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name,

Your item delivery request was rejected.

Kindly visit our knowledge center to read our guidelines as regards items approved for delivery.

Best regards,

Sensational 7

Dear Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name,

Your item request was received and sent for approval.

Best regards,

Sensational 7

Dear Trigger - Record Created or Updated➛...➛First name,

Your item has been delivered as requested and we hope we look forward to continually doing business with you.

Best regards,

Sensational 7

logic_definition.display_value: Wait for a duration of time
